# Reports Directory

This directory will contain all generated reports and visualizations:

## Generated Files

- `insights_summary.txt` - Text summary of key insights
- `airline_sentiment_report.pdf` - Comprehensive PDF report
- `airline_statistics.csv` - Airline performance statistics
- `wordcloud_positive.png` - Positive sentiment word cloud
- `wordcloud_neutral.png` - Neutral sentiment word cloud
- `wordcloud_negative.png` - Negative sentiment word cloud
- `sentiment_distribution.html` - Interactive sentiment chart
- `sentiment_by_airline.html` - Airline sentiment breakdown
- `topic_distribution.html` - Topic frequency chart
- `topic_keywords.html` - Topic keywords visualization
- `airline_comparison.html` - Airline comparison chart
- `sentiment_scores.html` - Sentiment score comparison

All files are automatically generated during analysis.
